planner_payload.notes: Single-stage (coder) is sufficient to add a central HoverMessageService and a lightweight host component, wire it into the app shell, and route notifications through it. No new dependencies; CSS-only animations. If an existing notification system exists, coder will extend/adapt it instead of replacing to keep the diff minimal.
